short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remap for Belgian keyboard that changes right ctrl to backslash.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A remapping extention that changes the rightcontrol key to "<>\".
Created for ChromeOS!

!!! ATTENTION !!!

The extention does not work on the sign in due to security issues.
